_sText:
I have changed the name to "jb_orange" since it now meets all the requirements to be a Riotmod Jailbreak map.


Changelog
Beta 1 - 1.9:
* fixed a few bugs in the map, added a few lights and doorknobs
* Added a gun rack to prevent prisoners from grabbing guns through the wall
* tinkered with lighting, the current rooms are probably in their final beta stage
* added 16 more spawns to bring the number up to 32
* added one additional area
* froze weapons in place to prevent server lag

Beta 2:
* reduced the invisible "clip" in front of the vent to increase entry difficulty
* fixed the underground tunnel glitch using a new wall tecnique I learned mapping for tremulous
* made the underground tunnel look way cooler
* fixed a few texture errors
* scooted one of the vents over to make it look better
* added a cityscape in the background

Beta 2.5:
* added soccer field
* added weapon and nade dispensers
* performance fixes

Beta 2.7:
* added 3rd story
*added balance fixes (changed autosniper for scout, added some climbable areas for a quick escape)
* better looking broken walls
* better prison gates

Beta 2.9:
* added (fully functional) dodgeball arena!
* more balance fixes
* added 5 second wait on deagle and nade spawnner
* added 10 second wait on deagle cable
* performance fixes

Beta 3:
* Radar images!
* optimization, optimization, optimization

RC1:
* full-sized 1st story
* better lighting
* more stylized for the orange theme
* improved areas (basement, upstairs, ect.)
* "wise" doors (the ones with animating doorknobs)
* eliminated most console & render errors
* optimization, optimization, optimization 

RC2:
* Completely Rebuilt Skybox
* new unreachable "visually enhancing" areas
* new hidden areas
* fixed the clogged teleporter problem
* fixed T's being abandoned in the dodgeball cage
* added a timer to the dodgeball cage to balance the aforementioned fix
* added portal hints to improve map performance
* Added Area Sounds
* Added Welcome cameras
Removed:
* suppressant gas (non working version in RC1) [feature removed]

V1:
* Finished new stairwell
* all stairs are now 8 rise 12 run
* removed the pipes from the basement
* basement is area portal'd
* hint locations improved
* improved scenic areas

Possible Features & changes
* a *.nav file for bots
* realistic textures [would be packaged in a different map]
